ygData.subject: Re: Let the battle begin!
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia thought about the way he was betraying his fellow Predicons,It was in the name of survival. He knew that all Predicons were expendable, They were to be

Phobia thought about the way he was betraying his fellow Predicons,It 
was in the name of survival. He knew that all Predicons were 
expendable, They were to be treated like sacraficial lambs, or 
whatever beasts they were.

Weaponsfire exploded around them like what will one day be Americas 
4th of July, missles and blaster fire hit the shields to dissapate in 
harmless flashes, yhe sky seemed singed from the blazing battle that 
surrounded them. 

Phobia checked his scanners, there were 4 or 5 attackers moving in 
from the opposite side to where he'd landed his ship. He hoped that 
the Predicons weren't smart enough to scan the surrounding area 
before attacking or the ships contents would belong to them.

"All this to stop me?" He thought that the timing of this attack was 
to much of a coincidence. He started negotiating with the Maximals 
right before the Predicons attacked, they must be there to punish him 
for his treason.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Mosquitor/The Cybertronian Fire/Kluster::
> 
> With a battle cry, Mosquitor rushes past Inferno and company, 
heading toward 
> the Cybertronian Fire. "DIE MAXIMALS!!!" he yells.
> 
> On the ship, a missile launcher calmly turns to target the insect, 
firing a 
> single missile after getting a lock.
> 
> Mosquitor's eyes widen as he sees the missile coming at him. The 
Pred raises 
> both hand, trying to block the missile. With a huge explosion, 
Mosquitor's 
> noew-charred body is blown back, smashing into the ground several 
times and 
> flipping over backwards before coming to a stop behind the rest of 
the 
> Predacon forces.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The shots fired by Rampage and Scourge are hit the shields of the 
> Cybertronian Fire, barely making it onto the energy readings. Three 
of the 
> laser batteries target Rampage, firing at him while the missile 
launcher that 
> had just taken Mosquitor out of the battle targets Scourge, firing 
a 
> signature-seeking missile at him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster exits the ship, seeing the battle going. "Let's hurry," he 
says to 
> Phobia, speeding up toward Phobia's ship.
